See https://typescript-eslint.io/rules/no-array-constructor for documentation.

Examples

This rule extends the base eslint/no-array-constructor rule. It adds support for the generically typed Array constructor (new Array<Foo>()).

‚ùå Incorrect

/*eslint no-array-constructor: "error"*/

Array(0, 1, 2);
new Array(0, 1, 2);

‚úÖ Correct

/*eslint no-array-constructor: "error"*/

Array<number>(0, 1, 2);
new Array<Foo>(x, y, z);

Array(500);
new Array(someOtherArray.length);
